sentences.en: Developments in South Africa receive extensive coverage in The Sunday Telegraph.
sentences.cn: 《星期日电讯报》全面报道了南非的发展。

sentences.en: Experts believe that the coming drought will be extensive.
sentences.cn: 专家们认为即将发生的旱灾将侵袭大片地区。

sentences.en: Fire has caused extensive damage to the island’s forests.
sentences.cn: 大火严重毁坏了岛上的森林。

sentences.en: He has received extensive corrective surgery to his skull.
sentences.cn: 他的头骨做过大面积的矫形手术。

sentences.en: How such extensive damage could have been sustained so quickly remains unexplained.
sentences.cn: 如何这么快就造成这么大的破坏依然不得而知。

sentences.en: Investigations had revealed extensive rot in the beams under the ground floor.
sentences.cn: 调查发现一层地下的横梁大面积腐烂。

sentences.en: It's a fair guess to say that the damage will be extensive.
sentences.cn: 说损失会很严重想必猜得不错。

sentences.en: Mr Marr makes extensive use of exclusively Scottish words.
sentences.cn: 马尔先生使用了大量苏格兰特有的词汇。

sentences.en: The £85m programme will involve an extensive rebranding of the airline.
sentences.cn: 这个8,500万英镑的项目将包括全面重塑该航空公司的形象。

sentences.en: The exhibition has received extensive coverage in the national press.
sentences.cn: 这次展览会被全国媒体广泛报道。

sentences.en: the extensive use of pesticides
sentences.cn: 杀虫剂的大量使用

sentences.en: The house has extensive grounds.
sentences.cn: 这栋房子有宽敞的庭院。

sentences.en: The house stands in extensive grounds.
sentences.cn: 这栋房子占地面积很大。

sentences.en: The IRA had extensive supplies of arms.
sentences.cn: 爱尔兰共和军有庞大的军备。

sentences.en: The palace has extensive gardens, a maze, and tennis courts.
sentences.cn: 这座宫殿有几座大花园、一处迷宫和几个网球场。

sentences.en: The report is underpinned by extensive research.
sentences.cn: 这份报告以广泛的研究为基础。

sentences.en: The shop stocks an extensive range of beach wear.
sentences.cn: 这家商店备有各式各样的沙滩服装。

sentences.en: There is an extensive repertoire of music written for the flute.
sentences.cn: 有很多供长笛演奏的曲目.

sentences.en: They began to lay in extensive stores of food supplies.
sentences.cn: 他们开始储备大量食物。

sentences.en: 英文例句3：Extensive research has been done into this disease.
sentences.cn: 对这种疾病已进行了广泛研究。

words.tran_cn: 延伸的；扩大的；长期的；广大的
延长；延期；扩大；伸展；电话分机
延伸；扩大；推广；伸出；给予；使竭尽全力；对…估价

trans.tran_en: large in size, amount, or degree
